channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP Systems Inc. -- QVR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP Systems Inc. -- QVR

item.title: CVE-2021-38686|2024-08-04T01:51:19.142Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qvr
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability has been reported to affect QNAP device, VioStor. If exploited, this vulnerability allows attackers to compromise the security of the system. We have already fixed this vulnerability in the following versions of QVR: QVR FW 5.1.6 build 20211109 and later

item.title: CVE-2021-34352|2024-08-04T00:12:48.698Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qvr
item.description: A command injection vulnerability has been reported to affect QNAP device running QVR. If exploited, this vulnerability could allow remote attackers to run arbitrary commands. We have already fixed this vulnerability in the following versions of QVR: QVR 5.1.5 build 20210902 and later

item.title: CVE-2021-34348|2024-08-04T00:05:52.511Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qvr
